## Discussion

When this mode is in use, the device’s tonal equalization is optimized for voice. For use with the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionCategory_PlayAndRecord] audio session category. On devices with more than one built-in microphone, the primary microphone is used.

Using this mode has the side effect of setting the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionProperty_OverrideCategoryEnableBluetoothInput] category override to `TRUE`.

This mode is equivalent to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/Mode-swift.struct/voiceChat] mode provided in the AVFoundation framework.

# kAudioSessionMode_VoiceChat

**Global Variable**

Specify this mode if your app is performing two-way voice communication, such as using Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP).

## Declaration

```swift
var kAudioSessionMode_VoiceChat: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

When this mode is in use, the device’s tonal equalization is optimized for voice. For use with the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionCategory_PlayAndRecord] audio session category. On devices with more than one built-in microphone, the primary microphone is used.

Using this mode has the side effect of setting the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionProperty_OverrideCategoryEnableBluetoothInput] category override to `TRUE`.

This mode is equivalent to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/Mode-swift.struct/voiceChat] mode provided in the AVFoundation framework.

## Constants

- **kAudioSessionMode_Default**: The default mode; used unless you set a mode with the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioSessionSetProperty(_:_:_:)] function.
- **kAudioSessionMode_VideoRecording**: Specify this mode if your app is recording a movie.
- **kAudioSessionMode_Measurement**: Specify this mode if your app is performing measurement of incoming audio.
- **kAudioSessionMode_GameChat**
